channel.title: Changelogs on Fluid Player Documentation
channel.description: Recent content in Changelogs on Fluid Player Documentation

item.title: Changelog
item.description: 2.4.5 Pull #325 Add poster image size option (posterImageSize) Pull #330 Add showPlayButton config to display Play button on ad Pull #306 Remove unsupported browser layout parts Pull #331 Add ability to change controls titles Pull #332 Fix multiple videos play Pull #335 Improve timecode Pull #336 Add title Pull #334 Add ability to set preload value 2.4.4 Pull #289 Fix window.getComputedStyle call on null Pull #290 Prevent multi click event on download btn Pull #293 Check if Hls already exposed in window 2.
